name: test-weaver
description: CLI tool that weaves Jest-compatible .test.js files from simple YAML definitions.

scripts.docs:all: npm run toc && npm run docs:scripts && npm run docs:structure
scripts.toc: doctoc --github --title "## ğŸ“š Table of Contents" README.md
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.ready: npm run docs:all && npm run fix

scriptDescriptions.test: Runs all tests with Jest and generates a coverage report.
scriptDescriptions.test:watch: Runs Jest in watch mode, re-running tests on file changes.
scriptDescriptions.lint: Lints all JavaScript and Markdown files using ESLint.
scriptDescriptions.lint:fix: Automatically fixes linting issues in all JavaScript and Markdown files.
scriptDescriptions.format: Formats all JavaScript, Markdown, and JSON files with Prettier.
scriptDescriptions.docs:structure: Updates the project structure tree in `README.md`.
scriptDescriptions.docs:scripts: Updates the "Available Scripts" section in `README.md` with this script.
scriptDescriptions.docs:all: A convenience script that updates all documentation sections: table of contents, available scripts, and project structure.
scriptDescriptions.toc: Generates a Table of Contents in `README.md` using `doctoc`.
scriptDescriptions.check: A convenience script that runs the linter.
scriptDescriptions.fix: A convenience script that formats code and then fixes lint issues.
scriptDescriptions.ready: A convenience script to run before committing: updates all documentation and then formats and fixes all files.

author: ioncakephper
